sub_title: Director & Owner of KAAH Geoservices; Consulting Structural Geologist
summary: My background lies in the African and Australian minerals industry, as well as Earth Sciences research in Africa. Consequently, I bring applied structural geology and field science skills to exploration & mine sites across Africa using my own unique way of working. I also problem solve in minerals exploration and mining to target resources for optimal extraction.
